Great game but too many cheaters even in prime accounts.

Ive spent years accumulating hours on many accounts. This being my main, I'd figure id give some insight into this game. 

Making a new acccount is almost impossible, trust factor is more important then prime. You are forced to work through hundreds of games with cheaters before you can make it to a trust factor level where you want have a waller or spinbotter every game.

Despite a horrible anti cheat system and bad trust factor issues. The game is still amazing. We might not have 128 tick servers, we might not have a good anti cheat, we might not get good new maps. But at the end of all of it, the game is consisently enjoyable. This is a game that youll always feel comfortable going back to.
